prerequisite: Yale-NUS Year One and Two Common Curriculum, or as approved by Head of Study. Registry Comments: YCC1112 Literature and Humanities 2 and YCC1114 Philosophy and Political Thought 2 and YCC1121 Comparative Social Institutions YCC2121 Modern Social Thought
moduleDescription: This course offers students an opportunity for in-depth immersion into a specialist and current topic in the field of Urban Studies. The topics on offer will vary from year to year, but will generally be related to a specific current issues in the field of urban studies.
